topComments.author: Josie Jo
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Diversificada sele√ß√£o de animais. Com a implementa√ß√£o do sistema de agendamento n√£o h√° multid√µes e voc√™ pode chegar perto das principais atra√ß√µes, girafas, zebras, tigres de bengala e le√µes africanos sem ter que esperar na fila ou pessoas bloqueando voc√™. Mas n√£o pule os outros animais, n√≥s pessoalmente gostamos dos flamingos e pav√µes. Os atendentes est√£o visivelmente ativos com os animais por toda parte. O zoom em si √© bem conservado e limpo. Altamente recomendado se voc√™ tem filhos e / ou est√° procurando um passeio agrad√°vel de aproximadamente 2 horas.  (Original) Diverse selection of animals.  With the implementation of the appointment system there are no crowds and you can get up close to the main attractions, giraffes, zebra, Bengal tigers and African lions without having to wait in line or people blocking you. But don't skip the other animals, we personally enjoyed the flamingos and peacocks. The attendants are visibly active with the animals throughout. The zoom of itself it well kept and clean. Highly recommend if you have kids and/or you're looking for a pleasant approx 2hr outing.

Espero que algu√©m decida abri-lo novamente, porque o hamb√∫rguer e os cachorros-quentes na outra cafeteria da central n√£o t√™m um gosto t√£o bom üòÖ ent√£o recomendo caminhar com comida e lanches. (Original) Nice and clean, ample parking, the staff is so nice. My only problem is that the little cafeteria I grew up buying my burger and fries from is now closed down. I hope someone decides to open it up again, because the burger and hotdogs in the other cafeteria on the central are don't really taste so great üòÖ so I would recommend walk with food and snacks. Other than that the Zoo itself is so much more impressive now that it was when I was a kid. I loved taking my son over the weekend and we will definitely be visiting again soon.

topComments.author: Amanda Alleyne
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Alguns animais parecem subnutridos, os le√µes parecem terrivelmente magros. Os habitats s√£o t√£o pequenos e mal cuidados, que literalmente parece uma cela de pris√£o para eles. N√£o h√° atividades de enriquecimento para os animais. Os primatas parecem entediados. As gaiolas em que est√£o est√£o uma bagun√ßa. Os jacar√©s e jacar√©s n√£o t√™m abrigo do sol na √°gua em que est√£o. O n√≠vel da √°gua n√£o √© alto o suficiente para que fiquem totalmente submersos. As cobras e os peixes est√£o nos menores tanques poss√≠veis  (Original) Some animals look underfed, the lions look terribly skinny. The habitats are so small and under kept, it literally looks like a jail cell for them. There are no enrichment activities for the animals. The primates look bored out of their mind. The cages they're in are a mess. The alligators and cayman have no shelter from the sun in the water they're in. The water level isn't high enough for them to be fully submerged. The snakes and fish are in the smallest tanks possible
